newsitem.title: USA: Air Marketing has cargo office at Miami airport.
newsitem.headline: Air Marketing has cargo office at Miami airport.

text.p: Air Marketing Associates, the London-based cargo general sales agency, has opened its first Western hemisphere office in Miami, the manager told Reuters Wednesday.
"We're in Miami to grow with Miami as the cargo hub of the Americas," said Wayne McElhaney, manager of AMA's Americas office.
The new Air Marketing office currently represents Air Jamaica and expects to add other airlines, said McElhaney.
In London, Airline Marketing represents about 15 airlines and specializes in Eastern Europe, McElhany said.

Besides representing Air Jamaica, the new Miami office will work with the London office to arrange for perishables coming from Latin America to European destinations. It also offers a cargo tracking system.
McElhaney, an Eastern Airlines veteran, most recently worked for Miami-based Challenge Air Cargo.
